languages.text: "Но то, что случилось на улицах ульев... О, багрово-сизые шрамы еще нескоро сотрутся с душ тех, кто пережил сей кошмар".
"But what happened in the streets of the hives... Oh, the scarlet-blue scars will not soon be erased from the souls of those who lived through this nightmare."
languages.original_text: "Но то, что случилось на улицах ульев... О, багрово-сизые шрамы еще нескоро сотрутся с душ тех, кто пережил сей кошмар".

traits.locale_text: "But what happened in the streets of the hives... Oh, the scarlet-blue scars will not soon be erased from the souls of those who lived through this nightmare."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But what happened in the streets of the hives... Oh, the scarlet-blue scars will not soon be erased from the souls of those who lived through this nightmare."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “可发生在巢都街道上的事情……噢，那些在这场噩梦中幸存下来的人们，他们灵魂中红蓝相交的伤痕恐怕不会很快平复。”
languages.original_text: "But what happened in the streets of the hives... Oh, the scarlet-blue scars will not soon be erased from the souls of those who lived through this nightmare."

traits.locale_text: “可发生在巢都街道上的事情……噢，那些在这场噩梦中幸存下来的人们，他们灵魂中红蓝相交的伤痕恐怕不会很快平复。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Mais ce qui s'est passé dans les rues des ruches... Ceux qui ont survécu à ce cauchemar ne sont pas prêts de l'oublier. Ces cicatrices bleu écarlate vont les marquer à vie. »
languages.original_text: "But what happened in the streets of the hives... Oh, the scarlet-blue scars will not soon be erased from the souls of those who lived through this nightmare."

traits.locale_text: « Mais ce qui s'est passé dans les rues des ruches... Ceux qui ont survécu à ce cauchemar ne sont pas prêts de l'oublier. Ces cicatrices bleu écarlate vont les marquer à vie. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Pero lo que pasó en las calles de las colmenas... las cicatrices escarlatas y azuladas tardarán en desaparecer de las almas de los supervivientes de esta pesadilla».
languages.original_text: "But what happened in the streets of the hives... Oh, the scarlet-blue scars will not soon be erased from the souls of those who lived through this nightmare."

traits.locale_text: «Pero lo que pasó en las calles de las colmenas... las cicatrices escarlatas y azuladas tardarán en desaparecer de las almas de los supervivientes de esta pesadilla».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「ですがハイヴの通りで起きたことは…ああ、緋色の青い傷が、この悪夢を生きた人々の魂からすぐに消えることはないでしょう」
languages.original_text: "But what happened in the streets of the hives... Oh, the scarlet-blue scars will not soon be erased from the souls of those who lived through this nightmare."

traits.locale_text: 「ですがハイヴの通りで起きたことは…ああ、緋色の青い傷が、この悪夢を生きた人々の魂からすぐに消えることはないでしょう」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Doch was auf den Straßen der Makropolen geschehen ist ... Ach, die rot-blauen Narben werden nicht so bald von den Seelen derer verschwinden, die diesen Albtraum erlebt haben."
languages.original_text: "But what happened in the streets of the hives... Oh, the scarlet-blue scars will not soon be erased from the souls of those who lived through this nightmare."

traits.locale_text: "Doch was auf den Straßen der Makropolen geschehen ist ... Ach, die rot-blauen Narben werden nicht so bald von den Seelen derer verschwinden, die diesen Albtraum erlebt haben."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "But what happened in the streets of the hives... Oh, the scarlet-blue scars will not soon be erased from the souls of those who lived through this nightmare."

languages.text: "Fakat kovan sokaklarında yaşananlar... Olan biteni deneyimleyenlerin ruhlarına işleyen kızıl mavi izler, öyle kolay kolay silinmeyecek."
languages.original_text: "But what happened in the streets of the hives... Oh, the scarlet-blue scars will not soon be erased from the souls of those who lived through this nightmare."
